block.p: PAPPAS - Chrysanthi. Beloved wife of the late Lambros. Loving mother of Anastasia Nicholas and Chris and mother-in-law of George & Helen. Cherished grandmother of John, Chris-Ann, Irene, Kalli and Dean. Reposing at Papavero Funeral Home 72-27 Grand Ave, Maspeth. Funeral liturgy St. Paraskevi and St. Haralambos Greek Orthodox Church, Monday 10 AM. Interment Cypress Hills Cemetery. Visiting Sunday 2-5 and 7-9PM.
